item.title: HoloDungeon: Koyori vs. Hollow Live in Honsha Tower launches in Early Access on January 22, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

hololive-themed roguelike RPG dated.

Publisher holo Indie and developer Velux Studio will release roguelike RPG HoloDungeon: Koyori vs. Hollow Live in Honsha Tower, based on the VTuber group hololive, in Early Access for PC via Steam on January 22, 2026 for 1,500 yen, the companies announced. A 10 percent-off launch sale will be held for the first week of launch.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Wonderful maze “HoloDungeon” changes form with each challenge—within it lurks Hollow, beings not unlike Holomen. To rescue her snatched friends and make special Live a success, Hakui Koyori tries an unknown adventure! A roguelike RPG where you play using wisdom and brains remain even after down.

Story

With the special live performance just around the corner, Hakui Koyori was living a hectic life, her heart filled with both uncontrollable excitement and anxiety.

Just as most of the meticulous planning was complete, the world suddenly transformed into the mysterious labyrinth known as the “HoloDungeon.”

“Oh noooooo! Help me, Koyoriii!”

“La, Lap-chan!?”

And soon after the incident began, a fellow member of the same secret society was too quick kidnapped. Can Koyori save her friends and successfully hold the special live performance…

HoloDungeon

The HoloDungeon is a dungeon that shifts its form like a hologram. Layers are automatically generated, ensuring no adventure is ever repeated twice. A fresh and exciting experience awaits you every time.

If you fall in the dungeon, you will lose many things gained during that adventure, such as picked-up items and experience points. However, the knowledge gained from that adventure will surely help you on your next one.

Also, “Dungeon Experience Points” are not lost even if you fall in a dungeon, and the “Decorate Recipes” obtained by paying these points are also important keys to clearing the dungeon.

Hollow

An existence not dissimilar to Hololive talents, yet replicated by someone being. The Hollows, each possessing diverse ability and characteristics, await the protagonist, Koyori.

However, if you can fully understand Hollow’s unique character, you might be able to use that to your advantage in your strategy.

Items and Dungeon Traps

Items and traps found while exploring HoloDungeon are packed with Hololive elements!

Even items or traps that seem tricky at first look may become your savior in a pinch, if utilized properly. Of course, the reverse is also true.

Decorate System

By using “Koyorinium” accumulated during dungeon exploration, you can blended new medicine or perform “Decorate” to dramatically enhance the performance of weapons and armor.

These effects are extremely powerful and can serve as a trump card to decisively break through seemingly deadlocked situations.

Items with weak or disadvantageous effects can also serve as important “Decorate” materials, bringing a fresh sense of strategy to dungeon exploration.

Watch a recent trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Earnest Evans Collection for PS5, PS4 delayed to February 19, 2026 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5

Switch version still due out on December 25 as planned.

Edia has delayed the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions of Earnest Evans Collection from its previously planned December 25, 2025 release date in Japan to February 19, 2026 due to a sudden issue that requires immediate revision. The Switch version will still release as planned on December 25.

As previously announced, the collection will include Telenet’s Wolf Team titles El Viento, Earnest Evans, and Anett Futatabi. El Viento originally launched for Genesis on September 20, 1991 in Japan, followed by November 1991 in North America; Earnest Evans launched for Mega-CD on December 20, 1999, followed by Genesis in March 1992 in North America; and Anett Futatabi launched for Mega-CD on March 30, 1993 in Japan.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/earnest-evans-collection-for-ps5-ps4-delayed-to-february-19-2026-in-japan

item.title: Silver Palace ‘Monotype’ beta test announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Recruitment available until January 5, 2026.

Publisher Elementa and developer Silver Studio have opened sign-ups for the “Monotype” beta test for May-announced fantasy adventure open-world action RPG Silver Palace, the companies announced. It will be playable on PC.

Here is an overview of the test, via Elementa:

■ “Monotype” Beta Test Recruitment

How to Participate

Click the “Sign Up for Test” button on the official homepage and fill out the sign-up form for a chance to join our test group!

  • Recruitment Deadline: January 5, 2026 at 16:00 (UTC)

*Engage with our official social media events to earn a chance to become a tester. Please refer to our official social media post for details.

Test Information

  • Type of Test: Small-scale closed beta with a data wipe and no in-game purchases.
  • Test Platform: PC (Windows)

Recruitment Overview

  • We will make contact with successful applicants via email after recruitment closes. Please keep an eye on your inbox.
  • All versions of the game available during the [Monotype] Beta Test are under development and not representative of the final release version.
  • Test access for the [Monotype] Beta Test is limited to this round of testing. Eligibility for any future testing will be determined separately.
  • Testing is only open to Detectives aged 18 and above.

■ “Monotype” Beta Test FAQ

How can I get access to the test?

This test is open only to participants 18 years or older. Click the “Sign Up for Test” button on the official homepage and fill out the sign-up form for a chance to join our test group!

*In addition, engagement with official social media events will also earn you the chance to become a tester. Please refer to our official social media post for details.

What is the recruitment period for “Monotype” Beta Test?

From now to January 5, 2026 at 16:00 (UTC).

What type of test is this?

The “Monotype” Beta Test will be a small-scale closed beta with a data wipe and no in-game purchases.

What devices are supported in this test? What are the device requirements for this test?

This test will support PC (Windows) devices exclusively. To ensure smooth installation and gameplay, the recommended specifications are as follows:

  • CPU: Intel Core i7-12700 12th Generation
  • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, or an AMD graphics card with equivalent capabilities
  • RAM: 16 GB
  • Available storage: At least 60 GB SSD

*Please note that fullscreen mode is not currently supported on 4:3 monitors.

How will I know whether I have been granted test access?

We will be in touch via email using the contact information provided in the sign-up form after recruitment ends, provided you have been found eligible. Proceed to our official homepage and click on the “Check Test Access” button to review your eligibility. For details, please refer to our social media.

⚠ Test eligibility is for personal use only and is not transferable, not shareable, and not saleable.

If the above information does not answer my question, how can I make further inquiries?

Please send us your questions via email at [email protected].

Thank you for your interest and support!

Silver Palace will be available for console, PC, iOS, and Android. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch a new trailer below.
